ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors would like to thank the GEM ClimateBasis and GeoBasis ( www.g-e-m.dk) for their careful data collection activities. Thanks to the Danish Meteorological Institute www.dmi.dk for generous publishing of data. Thanks to Mikkel Tamstorf, Christian Juncher JÃ¸rgensen, Dorthe Petersen, Michael Kuhn and Kirsty Langley for comments to an earlier version of the manuscript.
